review: I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise you provided during my recent dental visit. Your warm and welcoming demeanor instantly put me at ease, making the experience much more comfortable.  Your skillful work on my filling and bleaching exceeded my expectations, and I am truly delighted with the results. Not only did you enhance my smile, but you also ensured that I felt comfortable throughout the entire process.  Thank you for your dedication to your profession and for your commitment to patient well-being. I feel fortunate to have found such a wonderful dentist, and I look forward to future visits under your care.

review:
Dr Arvinder Kaur is a very humble person who knows her job well.   She explained the pros and cons of the treatment before proceeding.  I was fully convinced and satisfied with the treatment provided to me.  Hygiene and cleanliness was another good factor in the clinic during this pandemic period.   All essential protocols were also followed by her.   I would recommend her to my family and friends.  

I wish her good luck in her future endeavours.
